title: encrypted block of data
extract: The Volume Encryption feature in OpenStack presents a normal block storage device to the VM but encrypts the data in the virtualization host before writing to a remote disk. ... To the end user, the block server operates exactly as it would when reading and writing unencrypted blocks.Nov 8, 2013
extract_html: The Volume Encryption feature in OpenStack presents a normal block storage device to the VM but encrypts the data in the virtualization host before writing to a remote disk. ... To the end user, the block server operates exactly as it would when reading and writing unencrypted blocks.Nov 8, 2013
